title: Alien (Reference)
lyrics:
[Chorus: Ant Clemons]
Turned to a Mothra, bro, this that Godzilla
Turned to a monster, more like Othello
Phantom of the opera, it goes where it goes
My nightmares still haunt me (Dream)
When I sleep, they haunt me
When I sleep, they haunt me (Ooh)
And my nightmares, they haunt me (Ooh, ooh)
But I won't let 'em get the best of me (Yeah)
[Verse: Pusha T]
Alien, too easy to write 'em off, ooh
Leave it to Yeezy to fight 'em off
Beam me up, I'm 'bout to sign off
TMZ, I needed that time off
TMI, see Robеrt thought he could fly
His bad, forgot it was CGI
Blind, none of us read thе signs
Blame, got daughter to keep in mind
Alien, ooh, illegal as alien
Many times, I needed that time off
I don't believe in time, I just believe in signs
Arms are at three and nine
Knowin' that he is mine
Alien, ooh, we about to fly out
Where we land?
Look just like a hideout
The alone, not alumn'
‘Minati, nobody need not assume
Better schools, less shooters
Pardon me, free Hoover, ooh
Ooh, feel it, feel it
My truth, live it, ego, kill it
Kill it, ego, kill it, my pain, feel it
No meds, feel it, I just deal with
Alien, took some time off, ooh
I just took time off
Conspiracy theory is, I'm delirious
Duh, period, I'm dead serious
Ooh, ooh, I'm dead serious
Ooh, ooh, I'm dead serious
